entry.title: sweenzor/writelatex-compile
entry.summary:
Use the writeLaTeX API to compile tex files to pdf

writeLaTeX Compile

Use the writeLaTeX API to compile LaTeX files to PDF from the commandline. Without installing anything. (Other than python)

Usage

> python compile.py example.tex
Uploaded: https://www.writelatex.com/66035jrhwkk
PDF size: 55721 bytes
PDF saved: 'example.pdf'
